array.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS epg ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name NVARCHAR(64), channel_id NVARCHAR(128), start_time INTEGER, end_time INTEGER, UNIQUE (channel_id,start_time) ON CONFLICT REPLACE );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS media ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, flag tinyint(2), gid NVARCHAR(64), sid NVARCHAR(32), cateid NVARCHAR(32), catename NVARCHAR(32), metadata NVARCHAR(4096), title NVARCHAR(128) , bigpic NVARCHAR(256) , pic NVARCHAR(256) , note NVARCHAR(32), author NVARCHAR(512), source NVARCHAR(512), intro NVARCHAR(1024), content NVARCHAR(2048), area NVARCHAR(32), score INTEGER, views INTEGER, mp4 NVARCHAR(512), m3u8 NVARCHAR(512), pubdate TIMESTAMP, updatetime TIMESTAMP default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, url NVARCHAR(512) , data1 INTEGER default 0, data2 INTEGER default 0, data3 float default 0, data4 TIMESTAMP default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, data5 NVARCHAR(512), data6 NVARCHAR(512), UNIQUE (gid,sid) );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS video_download ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, flag tinyint(2), gid NVARCHAR(64), sid NVARCHAR(32), cateid NVARCHAR(32), catename NVARCHAR(32), metadata NVARCHAR(4096), title NVARCHAR(128) , bigpic NVARCHAR(256) , pic NVARCHAR(256) , note NVARCHAR(32), author NVARCHAR(512), source NVARCHAR(512), intro NVARCHAR(1024), content NVARCHAR(2048), area NVARCHAR(32), score INTEGER, views INTEGER, mp4 NVARCHAR(512), m3u8 NVARCHAR(512), pubdate TIMESTAMP , updatetime TIMESTAMP default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, url NVARCHAR(512) , data1 INTEGER default 0, data2 INTEGER default 0, data3 float default 0, data4 TIMESTAMP default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, data5 NVARCHAR(512), data6 NVARCHAR(512), starttime TIMESTAMP default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , videoindex INTEGER default 0, progress float default 0, status INTEGER default 0, dsize INTEGER default 0, UNIQUE (mp4) );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cache ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, domain NVARCHAR(52) default 'G', key NVARCHAR(128) not null, value NVARCHAR(40960), updatetime TIMESTAMP, readtime TIMESTAMP, UNIQUE (domain,key) ON CONFLICT REPLACE );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS queue ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, domain NVARCHAR(52) , qid NVARCHAR(52) , data NVARCHAR(40960) , data2 NVARCHAR(512), data3 NVARCHAR(512), data4 NVARCHAR(512), data5 NVARCHAR(512), data6 NVARCHAR(512), status tinyint(1) default 0, updatetime TIMESTAMP default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UNIQUE (domain,qid,data) );
